message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12000 to us. Considering the significant importance this product holds for both of us, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $11000. This offer is tailored to ensure we both gain from this transaction while maintaining the integrity and value of the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.
